mapper.select: select a.*,p.thumbnail_img from alert as a inner join products as p on a.product_idx=p.product_idx where a.member_id=#{member_id} order by a_idx desc
mapper.update: update alert set a_state=0 where a_idx=#{a_idx} and member_id=#{member_id};

insert.selectKey: SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(member_id) FROM orders WHERE product_idx = #{product_idx};
insert.foreach: insert into alert(a_title, msg, member_id, a_url, a_state, product_idx) values('주문', '주문신청이 마감되었습니다', #{member_id}, 'alertUpdate', 1,#{product_idx});
